titleStmt.title: Letter from Mr. Chantemps, Minister of the Colonies to Minister, October 8, 1895

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from Mr. Chantemps, Minister of the Colonies to Minister

div1.p:
Monsieur le Ministre et cher Collègue,
Notre Vice-Consul à Sierra-Leone vient de me faire parvenir mon exemplaire de la brochure contenant les statuts de "l'International Missionary Alliance."
Comme suite à ma lettre du 9 Février dernier, j'ai
div1.ab: Monsieur Chantemps Ministre des Colonies Paris
div1.note: M. Bey voir d'en eu parler
div1.p: l'honneur de vous envoyez, ci-joint, ce document que je vous serai obligé de vouloir bien me retourner, lorsqu'il aura cessé de vous être utile./.

Agréez, Monsieur le Ministre et cher Collègue, les assurances de ma haute considération.
A M Sas

Mister Minister and dear colleague,
Our Vice-Consul in Sierra-Leone has just sent to me my copy of the brochure containing the status of "the International Missionary Alliance."
To follow my letter from last February 9th, I have
div1.ab: Mister Chantemps Minister of the Colonies Paris
div1.note: Mr. Bey seen to have talked
div1.p: the honor to send to you, enclosed, this document that I will be obliged to you to return to me, when it has ceased to be useful to you./.

Accept, Mister Minister and dear colleague, the assurances of my highest consideration.
A M Sas
